DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy of the dual therapy of atorvastatin + amlodipine vs. amlodipine alone .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Amlodipine/Atorvastatin Co-Administration To Amlodipine Alone In Patients With Hypertension And Dyslipidemia
DOC.criteria: Subjects with a diagnosis of both hyperlipidemia and hypertension. Subjects with Type 1 diabetes mellitus or Type 2 diabetes mellitus. Subjects with other atherosclerotic disease.
